data.title: ADC Telecommunications - M&A Summary, Ownership, and Business Overview
data.meta_description:
ADC Telecommunications has acquired 16 companies of its own. A total of 2 acquisitions came from private equity firms. It has also divested 2 assets.
                ADC Telecommunications’ largest acquisition to date was in 2000, when it acquired Broadband Access Systems for $2.3B. It’s largest disclosed sale occurred in 2003, when it
                        sold Altitun AB to Visma Oy for $3M. ADC Telecommunications has acquired in 8 different US states, and 4 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include technology hardware (57%) and  communications (25%).
data.text:
ADC Telecommunications M&A Summary

ADC Telecommunications has acquired 16 companies of its own. A total of 2 acquisitions came from private equity firms. It has also divested 2 assets.

ADC Telecommunications’ largest acquisition to date was in 2000, when it acquired Broadband Access Systems for $2.3B. It’s largest disclosed sale occurred in 2003, when it sold Altitun AB to Visma Oy for $3M. ADC Telecommunications has acquired in 8 different US states, and 4 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include technology hardware (57%) and communications (25%).

ADC Telecommunications Ownership

ADC Telecommunications Business Overview
